title: Final Fantasy
description: The original JRPG, FINAL FANTASY, amazed the world with its rich story and open world. Guide a party of four Warriors of Light through a fantasy world beset with monsters and evil wizards. Engage in tactical turn-based side-view battles and manage the promotion of character classes in a sprawling world!

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: In this classic adventure game, you'll embark on a quest through an open fantasy world to find the Triforce, slay Ganon, and save Princess Zelda. You adventure will be full of dungeons, puzzles, and menacing monsters. You will brandish a variety of weapons like swords, boomerangs, bombs, and arrows. Collect items, find secrets, and save the princess!

title: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: Mario is back in SUPER MARIO BROS. 3! There are new 2D platforming levels and worlds to explore! Jump on monsters, fight mini-bosses, dodge cannonballs, and even avoid ghosts to rescue the King's Wand! Warp through levels and collect special suits that power you up like The Raccoon Suit and The Frog Suit that help you fly and swim through obstacles! SUPER MARIO BROS. 3 is fun to play alone, or to play co-op with a friend!

title: Final Fantasy III
description: FINAL FANTASY III continues the turn-based JRPG tradition of the series, letting you fight through a fantasy world with a party of four heroes! In this game, you can choose different classes for your heroes and summon powerful creatures to aid you in battle like Shiva and Bahamut! Use swords and magic to traverse dungeons, fight monsters, complete quests, and save the world!

title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
description: The sequel to The Legend of Zelda combines side-scrolling 2D platformer action with role-playing game elements. In Zelda II: The Adventure of Link, you'll embark on a fantasy quest to find the Triforce of Courage, awaken Princess Zelda from an evil wizard's spell, and save Hyrule from ruin. As Link, you can learn magic spells and collect items to increase your power. Zelda II features magic that lets you fly, throw fireballs, jump higher, and more.

title: Dragon Quest
description: Dragon Warrior... embark on an epic journey through a fantasy open world to defeat the dark Dragon-lord, save the princess, and bring light back to the kingdom. Solve puzzles, explore lands, use swords and magic to fight monsters like slimes and dragons, and fulfil your destiny in this turn-based single player JRPG! In this role-playing adventure, you are the Dragon Warrior!

title: Dragon Quest III
description: Play one of the most classic and revered turn-based JRPGs of all time... DRAGON QUEST III! Customize a unique hero (male or female) in this fantasy land where you must defeat the Demon Lord Baramos and his legion of monsters! Traverse over 50 caves, dungeons, and towns full of battles and puzzles! Guide a travelling party of three other companions form nine character classes in this epic adventure!

title: Super Mario Bros.
description: Can you save Princess Peach in this classic 2D platformer!? Play as Mario as you quickly run, swim, and jump through levels filled with monsters like koopas and goombas! Use power ups or cooperate with a friend to defeat the Koopa King in the fast-paced adventure that is SUPER MARIO BROS.

title: Final Fantasy II
description: FINAL FANTASY II is the classic turn-based party-based open-world JRPG following FINAL FANTASY. The game features the beautiful tale of four war-orphaned heroes who become embroiled in an epic war. Level up and customize your heroes with specific classes as they battle warriors and monsters with weapons and magic!

title: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!
description: In this single player boxing sports game, play as the underdog Little Mac as he fights through an international roster of boxers from all over the world, including the famous Mike Tyson! Time your punches precisely to win this boss rush of dangerous martial arts fighters in this Nintendo classic!

title: Mega Man
description: MEGA MAN is the robot defender of the human race and he must defeat seven robot masters under the control of the evil Dr. Wily! In this difficult 2D action platformer, fight through labyrinths of robots and collect new blaster weapons from bosses to upgrade your arsenal! Can you save the human race in this platformer classic?

title: Mega Man 2
description: MEGA MAN 2 continues Mega Man's fight against Dr. Wily's eight evil robot masters! Collect new weapons, items, and energy tanks as you jump and fight through levels of evil robots in this difficult, but rewarding, 2D action shooting platformer! You can even use your robot dog to help you!

title: Metroid
description: As Samus Aran, your mission is to stop space pirates from releasing the alien threat of Metroids. To do this, you must navigate the maze-like planet of Zebes! You will shoot aliens, solve navigation puzzles, collect new exciting items and blaster weapons, and experience the classic sci-fi 2D platformer action adventure that is METROID.

title: Castlevania
description: You're in for a long, terrifying night in CASTLEVANIA! As Simon Belmont, fight through a castle of horror monsters like goblins, demons, and wolves to defeat the evil Dracula! This difficult and precise 2D action platformer will have you use many weapons to traverse deeper into the castle labyrinths and face horrors head on! Keep your courage up and your whip ready!

title: Tetris
description: TETRIS is the classic Soviet puzzle game that swept the world. Quickly stack blocks before you get overwhelmed! You must use split-second decision making to make it through all 20 progressively harder levels! It's a perfect low-commitment quick, but rewarding, arcade puzzle game to play!

title: Excitebike
description: In this retro arcade racing game, you will ride your motorcycle through exciting and progressively harder races. You'll face crazy curves and daredevil jumps in this thrilling competitive motorcycling racing game!

title: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest
description: This sequel to the original CASTLEVANIA is even harder than before! As Simon Belmont, once again fight the horrifying Count Dracula and his minions of horror monsters from wolves, to zombies, to hellish demons! Purchase magic weapons like silver knives and flame whips to stay alive but beware the night! This classic Metroidvania will test your 2D action platforming and navigating skills against the creatures of the night!

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Fight evil alien robots and deadly ninjas as the TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES in this action packed 2D platformer! Unleash all kinds of ninja weapons as you travel past savage traps and secret sewers to defeat the evil Shredder in New York City! Fair warning! This game is challenging, so be careful or you'll be turtle soup!

title: River City Ransom
description: This classic 2D beat 'em up will have you and your friend go on a co-op brawl through the mean streets of River City! Fight through terrible gang members and defeat their bosses using nothing but your fists! Can you save the town from the evil ganglords?

title: Battletoads
description: Listen up, toads! We have to get even with the evil Dark Queen! Can you help the BATTLETOADS in this impossibily CHALLENGING quest! Fight through swarms of monsters and race on your hover bike in this action packed beat-em-up! Some call this the hardest game of all time... are you toad enough to beat it?

title: Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars
description: This JRPG collaboration from SquareSoft and Nintendo follows Mario and friends as they try to defeat the Smithy Gang and procure the seven star pieces of Star Road! Half the time you will be doing isometric 3D platforming, and the other half is fun turn-based party-based combat with magic and timing-based attacks! Find out for yourself why this game is such a cult classic!

title: Earthbound
description: Intergalactic alien terror strikes the small town of Onett and it's up to a courageous young boy named Ness and his friends to save the planet! This charming turn-based party-based JRPG boasts hilarious comedy, engaging gameplay, and an open world of towns and cities to explore! Don't miss out on this humorous classic JRPG!

title: Chrono Trigger
description: Often hailed as one of the greatest JRPG's of all time, CHRONO TRIGGER takes you on a science fantasy adventure full of time travel and colorful characters! It also boasts engaging turn-based tactical party combat with magic, science, swords, and even dinosaurs coming together to make an unforgettable story you don't want to miss!

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
description: Venture back to Hyrule and a fantasy age of magic and heroes! The predecessors of Link and Zelda face monsters and a menacing wizard threatens to take over the kingdom. Travel through an open world of mazes, dungeons, and shadowy forests and collect mighty swords and magical items! Solve the mysteries of the evil mage and the hidden realm of Hyrule!

title: Super Mario World
description: Mario is on his biggest adventure yet, and this time he's teaming up with his friend dinosaur Yoshi to save Princess Peach from Bowser once again! Travel through this whimsical world in engaging 2D platforming levels across nine lands that will test your jumping skills against monsters like goombas and koopas! Discover warps, bonus worlds, power ups in more in one of Mario's most classic 2D adventures!

title: Super Metroid
description: Fight space pirates and the alien Metroid force once again as Samus Aran in this classic sequel! You must navigate and find secret passages and weapon upgrades in the maze-like Planet Zebes and fight the menacing Ridley! Knock down alien enemies with somersaults and electric beams! They are no match for you and Samus in this action-packed space shooter!

title: Harvest Moon
description: Have a relaxing time in the nature-filled countryside of HARVEST MOON. This is a farm simulation game where you will maintain a farm that has been in disrepair! Build relationships with villagers, plant crops, sell harvest, raise livestock, and manage your daily business tasks. There's so much to do in this easy-going farming game.

title: Street Fighter II
description: STREET FIGHTER II brings you a roster of international fighters for you to fist fight against your friends with! This classic fighting game features eight marital arts masters and bosses to defeat in each character's unique arcade mode! Punch, kick, and chuck fireballs at your friends to become the world warrior!

title: Killer Instinct
description: The Ultratech KILLER INSTINCT Tournament calls upon martial arts masters and horrific horror monsters alike to fight in a game of deadly, bloody fisticuffs! Play against your friends with a wide roster of fighters and destroy them with eyelasers, wind kicks, and laser blades in this sci-fi horror-inspired competitive fighting game!

title: Zombies Ate My Neighbors
description: Yikes! ZOMBIES ATE MY NEIGHBORS! Zombies, chainsaw maniacs, mummies, and tons of horror monsters have attacked the surburbs and it's up to you to help the teenage stars of this game shoot their way through these horrifying scenarios. This tongue-in-cheek horror-inspired shoot-'em-up still holds up! Play if you dare!

title: Batman Forever
description: Brace yourself for the endless action as you play the superheroes BATMAN and ROBIN in this co-op beat-em-up! On the streets of Gotham City, these heroes must fight through goons and supervillains with their combat moves and arsenal of gadgets! There are tons of hidden surprises to find in this comic book adventure!

title: Bebe's Kids
description: They're rough, they're tough, they're BEBE'S KIDS! Enter the comedic world of BEBE'S KIDS, as someone has taken over the amusement park Fun World! It's up to BEBE'S KIDS to fight through animatronic robots and security guards to stop the master robot threat! Can you handle the humorous BEBE'S KIDS!?

title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
description: It's Morphin' Time! Five super-powered teens must foil the plans of the Evil Empress Rita Repulsa and save Planet Earth! Choose your favorite color ranger and fight spectacularly monstrous enemies! You can even summon your mecha Dragonzord to help you in this action-packed beat-em-up!

title: Super Punch-Out!!
description: The tough sports series returns to the SNES with this boxing classic. Fight through another international circuit of fighters around the world, including old favorites like Mr. Sandman! Time your punches correctly to land satisfying blows in the intense boxing ring!

title: Star Fox
description: In the outer space Lylat star system, you are a futuristic, sci-fi space fighter in command of STAR FOX! Shoot through alien tanks and fighter ships with your attached laser guns at warp speed! You must use your skill and aim to destroy the enemy's home planet Venom and smash the Core Brain for victory!

title: Mega Man X
description: In the far sci-fi future, robots hold great danger and it is up to the super fighting robot, X, to save the day and defeat the evil Sigma! In this MEGA MAN successor, fight robot masters through action-packed platformer levels with a new arsenal of moves and weapons to collect! Can you save the human race from the evil robot threat?

title: F-Zero
description: The future of racing is here! F_ZERO, an Intergalactic Grand Prix, is a sci-fi racing tournament and you're invited! Choose from characters like the heroic Captain Falcon or sly alien Ploo! Race at top speeds in your ships to become the fastest racer in the galaxy in this classic for the genre!

title: Shining Force
description: In this classic JRPG tale, legendary warriors of the light valiantly drove Dark Dragon into another dimension. But, evil has returned. As a young swordsman, lead a party of warriors through a fantasy land in strategic tactical turn-based combat! Defeat monsters and bosses and equip weapons and magic rings to save the land!

title: Mortal Kombat
description: The #1 arcade hit is here on the Sega Genesis! This violent and gory fighting game features an intense roster of ninjas, monsters, and soldiers! Fight the evil boss Shang Tsung or fight your friends in this competitive and blood-filled fighter! Finish them!

title: Shining Force II
description: As a student of Astral the wizard, you and your friends study the usual subjects: magic, fantasy, and sword fighting! Now, dark events are taking place on the Island of Grans and your party of heroes must find the stolen Jewels by fighting monsters and villains in strategic tactical JRPG combat! Play the acclaimed sequel, SHINING FORCE II!

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: The evil scientist Dr. Eggman has snatched poor animals and turned them into robots! It's up to the speedy Sonic the Hedgehog to race through tons of colorful lands to stop him. This is a 2D platforming classic where you want to go as fast as possible all the time! Speed through obstacles as the super-cool SONIC THE HEDGEHOG! Gotta go fast!

title: Landstalker
description: The elf treasure hunter Nigel is undergoing a massive quest across a fantasy land to find pieces of King Nole's legendary treasure! Traverse villages, caves, and dungeons and collect loot and riches along your journey! Along the way, fight the evil armies of Duke Meroator! It's a fantastical open world action adventure treasure hunt!

title: Shining in the Darkness
description: Princess Jessa has gone missing and it's up to the Prince to join forces with a party of heroes to find her! You must traverse a dangerous labyrinths and dungeons in this first-person party-based dungeon crawler!

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Play the classic fast-paced platformer sequel SONIC THE HEDGEHOG 2! Now teaming up with his pal, Tails, you can play this game cooperatively with a friend! Speed through platformer hazards and robot animals in a high-speed chase to stop the devious Dr. Eggman once again!

title: Pokemon Red Version
description: Now, it's time to head out to become the world's greatest Pokémon trainer. It's going to take all you've got to collect 150 monsters in this enormous open world. Catch and train monsters like the shockingly-cute Pikachu. Battle other Pokemon Masters in excited turn-based combat with your party of Pokemon! Collect 'em all!

title: Castlevania Legends
description: dIn this single-player adventure, you play as Sonia Belmont, the very first in the line of vampire hunting Belmonts. Use your whip to fend off the horror monsters of darkness, as you work your way through six stages of non-linear gameplay. Don't forget to gather hearts and torches! Count Dracula awaits in this challenging action platformer!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
description: During a sailing voyage, Link becomes hopelessly sidetracked and finds himself shipwrecked on Koholint Island. Meet islanders, fight monsters, traverse dungeons, and find the eight Instruments of the Sirens to wake the Wind Fish! Can you solve the strange mysteries of this fantastical island with your sword and magic items in hand?

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Fall of the Foot Clan
description: In cahoots with exiled alien zap master Krang, the evil Shredder has once again kidnapped the dashing damsel of the news desk, April O'Neil. To rescue this ravishing reporter, you must return to the sewers and help our ninja turtle friends fight through New York City with their ninja weapons to save her! Fight all kinds of mutant gangsters in this portable quest! Cowabunga!

title: Dr. Mario
description: Dr. Mario needs your help to fight nasty viruses and germs with his vitamin capsules! Stack vitamin blocks and match them in this addicting portable puzzle game! The game gets more difficult as you progress so can you help Dr. Mario catch the germs!

title: Kirby's Dream Land
description: Dream Land is in peril as an evil king has stolen the magic Twinkle Stars! Help Kirby, an adorable little hero, as he runs, jumps, floats and swims in search of the magic Stars! This is a whimsical and easy-going platformer adventure your kid will love!

title: Metal Gear Solid
description: You are Snake, a government agent on a mission to regain control of a secret nuclear weapons base from terrorist hands. Snake must sneak through enemies and execute them silently to survive in this ahead-of-its-time espionage stealth action game! Follow the gripping, cinematic story of METAL GEAR SOLID!

title: Silent Hill
description: A young man searching for his daughter - struggling to exist in a place between reality and hell - a town hiding gruesome, dark secrets. Follow a trail of blood and mutilation to snatch a loved one from the clutches of a demonic power. This is a terrifying survival horror game that will put you through psychological madness!

title: Tekken 3
description: An ancient evil has reawakened, calling martial arts masters from around the globe to fight in the Iron Fist Tournament! Some for revenge, some for honor! This grungey sci-fi fighting game lets you compete against your friends with stylish fighters and extensive 3D movement that will have you fighting for hours!

title: Crash Bandicoot
description: Enter the vivid 3D world of Crash Bandicoot, a marsupial on a mission! His brain's been scrambled, his girlfriend is held captive, and his arch nemesis has a big N on his forehead! This hilariously fun, but challenging, 3D platformer will have you on the edge of your seat traversing the zany jungle as CRASH BANDICOOT!

title: Spider-Man
description: Play as the iconic comic book superhero, SPIDER-MAN, as you swing across New York City fighting a legion of sinister supervillains! The movement is acrobatic and the combat makes you feel like a superhero! The city is depending on you. Start swinging...

title: CTR: Crash Team Racing
description: It's a cartoony multiplayer kart racing game starring your favourite bandicoot, Crash and a host of his friends... and foes! The stakes are high and the competition is fierce. Race against your friends as hilarious racing hijinks ensure! Ready... Set... Go!!!!!

title: Resident Evil 2
description: CAN YOU SURVIVE THE HORROR? All of Raccoon City is infested. Blood-thirsty zombies, hideous mutations now overwhelm the community. Play as small town cops Leon and Claire as you shoot, solve puzzles, and try to survive the zombie horror! If the suspense doesn't kill you...something else will.

title: Final Fantasy VII
description: This critically-acclaimed turn-based party JRPG follows ex-SOLDIER Cloud Strife in the sci-fi fantasy city of Midgar. He and his friends will try to save the planet from Sephiroth and the evil megacorporation using magic, swords, and even gun arms! Collect element magical enhancements to customize your weapons! Experience the gripping, emotional story that defined a generation!

title: PaRappa the Rapper
description: Help PaRappa on his love quest as he raps alongside his Rap Masters! Match the music notes with your controller and try to keep the rhythm going in this funny, light-hearted children's music game

title: vib-ribbon
description: Take on the vib-ribbon challenge and I'll show you how to turn all your favourite CDs into PlayStation games. Witness infinite possibilities in one of the most simple, yet most challenging games ever! It's a cross between platformer and rhythm game with catchy songs you can even add on to yourself!

title: Digimon World
description: When you are pulled into a strange world, what awaits you on the other side? Are you the one they seek? In this fantastical world full of digital monsters, you must collect and create a party of Digimon to aid you in turn-based RPG combat against other monsters! Do you have what it takes to save Digimon World?

title: Twisted Metal
description: YOU ARE WHAT YOU DRIVE! Drive monster trucks into battle in this edgy sci-fi horror-inspired future! Choose from a roster of homicidal maniacs in the most deadly demolition derby ever! Fight against your friends in vehicular slaughter!

title: Alien Resurrection
description: Teamed with a crew of renegade space pirates on a research vessel headed for Earth, Ellen Ripley must fight for survival and destroy the Aliens once and for all. This horrifying first-person arcade shooter will have in the deepest parts of outer space trying to survive alien threats from the far future! Can you survive ALIEN RESURRECTION?

title: DOOM
description: You're a space Marine armed with a mere pistol. Your mission is to locate more substantial firepower, then blast your way through 27 level of the most explosive, demon-laden action ever! Shoot your way through hellish demons with an insane arsenal of weapons in this heavy metal first-person shooter! Rip and tear until it is done!

title: Medal of Honor
description: You are an elite Special Forces agent sent to execute covert operations, search and rescue missions, and commando raids. Fight to win the medal of Honor in the only game that lets you take on Nazis in WWII. This historical first-personal shooter will make you feel like you are on the front lines of D-Day!

title: Planet Dob
description: This trippy, psychadelic game is full of Y2K aesthetics! It features great music from J-Band Dob as well as minigames and tons of collectibles. Play through this strange 3D platforming collecting experience!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: This open-world fantasy adventure has you control Link throughout different time periods. In this fantastical time travel adventure, there are dungeons to explore, monsters and bosses to fight, and critically-acclaimed, emotional story to experience! With charming graphics and beautiful music, don't miss out on this action adventure!

title: Paper Mario
description: Mario is back in another turn-based party JRPG adventure on the N64! Save Princess Peach and the seven Star Spirits with a crew of lovable characters! There's a fun twist on JRPG combat with timing-based attacks and iconic moves from Mario's history! With its charming artstyle, don't miss out on PAPER MARIO!

title: GoldenEye 007
description: You are JAMES BOND! With you plentiful supply of firearms, it's up to you to complete your missions and objectives from London! It's high stakes first-person shooting gameplay in vivid 3D rooms! It also includes 4-player competitive shooting, so grab your friends and have a fun time!

title: Super Mario 64
description: SUPER MARIO 64 is the classic 3D platformer where you play as Mario and travel through multiple worlds through paintings! Here you can explore vast and colorful levels to collect stars! Collect enough stars and maybe you can save the Princess Peach from Bowser once again! It's a whimsical experience through the Mushroom Kingdom that still holds up!

title: Mario Kart 64
description: Three... Two... One... GO! Race against your friends in the colorful Mushroom Kingdom with new 3D graphics! Choose from a roster of your favorite Mario heroes and villains! Tell your friends to bring it on in the highly competitive Battle mode. Advanced features allow you to race with your Ghost. It's fun races ahead in MARIO KART 64!

title: WWF No Mercy
description: Jump into the ring with the biggest, baddest jambronis around and experience brutal WWF action never before seen in a console game! Over 65 wrestling superstars, all-new Ladder matches, and all-new Double-Team moves, like the Dudley 3D Deathdrop! It's the ultimate wrestling match against friends!

title: Command & Conquer
description: Welcome to the New World Order. A gritty high tech world where the art of electronic intelligence and covert surveillance reigns supreme. Build bases, muster forces and lacerate your enemies to the bone. All for the love of power. In the hyper-real combat experience of Command & Conquer, race for global control with strategic thoughtful real-time military gameplay!

title: Star Fox 64
description: Join Fox McCloud and his Star Fox team as they fight to save the galaxy from the clutches of the evil Andross. Travel to many different 3-D worlds. Battle the enemy in the air and on the ground and listen in as Fox McCloud interacts with a cast of characters. Shoot from your space ship in high-octane dogfighting combat!

title: Pokemon Snap
description: The Professor has asked you to capture the Wild Pokémon of Pokémon island...on film! It's a relaxing, light-hearted voyage as you go through Pokemon Island snapping pictures of wild Pokemon! See the beautiful environments of Pokemon island and the variety of Pokemon that inhabit in 3-D!

title: Sonic Adventure
description: Sonic is back to save the world in his biggest adventure yet. Joined by friends new and old, Sonic must keep Dr Robotnik from obtaining all seven emeralds and unleashing Chaos on the world. In full 3D worlds and cities, run at top speed in high velocity action stages and adventure fields!

title: Jet Set Radio
description: Fight for control of Tokyo-to, mark your turf with graffiti, tag walls, billboards, and even rival gang members! Perform tricks and flips on magnetically driven in-line skates! Recruit more than 10 playable characters to your gang, each with their own unique graffiti! There are tons of urban environments to skate and grind on so go nuts while listening to the funky game music!

title: Marvel vs. Capcom 2
description: The world's most insane tag-team fantasy fighter is bigger than ever! An unprecedented 56 characters include the debut of Jill from Resident Evil, Servbots from Mega Man and Cable from Marvel Comics fame. Experience arcade perfect fighting with 3 on 3 tag-team battles, unbelievable control and hyper-fast animation. Pick a fight with legendary Capcom characters and Super Heroes from the Marvel Universe and prepare to be amazed.

title: Sonic Adventure 2
description: In the fight between heroes and villains, will you choose to save the world or conquer it? Save the day as heroes Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles or cause chaos as Shadow, Dr. Eggman, and Rouge, utilizing each of their unique skills and abilities! Go on high-speed action chases through cities in this high-octane fast-paced 3D platformer. When you want a break play the Chao Garden minigames and raise a pet Chao to compete in minigames!

title: Crazy Taxi
description: It's a race against the clock as you pick up passengers and white-knuckle it through busy streets and back alleys to their various destinations. To keep that meter collecting cash, you've gotta take the fastest route possible, even if it means bending the traffic laws--just a little. It's a hilarious, fast-paced game, full of funky music and high-speec action!

title: SoulCalibur
description: The greatest weapons-based fighter is here! This is a tale of souls and swords, transcending the world and all its history, told for all eternity... Soul Calibur unleashes incredible graphics, fantastic fighters, and combos so amazing they'll make your head spin! Sharpen your blades and prove your mettle!

title: Capcom vs. SNK 2: Millionaire Fighting 2001
description: Now, two of the world's fighting giants battle on the Nintendo GameCube system! CAPCOM VS. SNK 2 unleashes lightning fast animation and classic arcade fighting action in a collosal slug-fest. Choose from over 44 characters from the Capcom and SNK fighting universes, then customize your character's fighting style with your own favorite Groove. Fight against your friend and unleash devastating combos and super moves in this crossover event!

title: Skies of Arcadia
description: The age of exploration has dawned and you are about to embark on a magical journey, a voyage of discovery across the vast Skies of Arcadia in search of treasures untold, and where there is treasure, there will be Air Pirates! With over six vast lands to navigate, magnificent ships to fly and customize, a host of weapons and magical spells to be discovered and unique Internet functions to aid your quest, Skies of Arcadia is the most immense turn-based JRPG experience ever created.

title: Shenmue
description: A massive and highly detailed 3D world unlike anything ever seen. Real-time fighting with moves learned throughout the game - motion capture with real budo experts. Interact with a huge cast of characters in a modern-day town with movements as intricate as a twitch of a finger. Experience the action-packed and charming story of SHENMUE!
